Download the Hollywoodbets App today on your Apple device and enjoy the very best of sports betting, horse racing, Spina Zonke, Aviator and more! 

Why the Hollywoodbets App?
The Hollywoodbets App packages your favourite features from our mobisite into a slick, responsive app. Some of these benefits include:
•         Some of the most competitive odds in South Africa
•         The ability to cash out your soccer multiples
•         Live In-Play betting
•         Comprehensive soccer and sports betting options
•         A full selection of Spina Zonke games
•         Access to Aviator and all other crash games
•         Horse racing betting
•         24/7 customer support
•         A whole host of deposit options

Score more with soccer and sports betting
Take the thrill of the match with you wherever you go and level up your sports and soccer betting experience. Use our cashout feature to stay in control of your multiples and bet on the action as it happens with our Live In-Play facility. 

Aviator and other crash games
Take to the skies and play Aviator on the Hollywoodbets App and you could win up to R10 000 000 per flight! You can also play all other crash games we offer via our app including favourites like Skyward, JetX, Shooting Star, FootballX, Big Bass Crash and more.
 
Spina Zonke – win up to R10 000 000
Choose from hundreds of Spina Zonke games on the app! Play games from world-renowned developers like Pragmatic Play, Habanero, Evolution and more. You can also participate in the Jackpot Race and Prize Drops promotions several times a week for the chance a share of prizes worth millions of rand. 



The best in casino games
Play a massive selection of casino games and casino-style gameshows on the app. From old favourites like Blackjack and Roulette to gameshows like Crazy Time and Megaball.

Lucky Numbers – over 3 000 draws per week
The Hollywoodbets App offers a massive range of Lucky Numbers draws for you to bet on. With over 3 000 draws to choose from weekly, our app offers one of the most comprehensive selections of Lucky Numbers draws in South Africa. 

HOLLYWOOD SPORTSBOOK IS A LICENSED BETTING OPERATOR. HOLLYWOODBETS SUPPORTS RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING. NO PERSONS UNDER THE AGE OF 18 YEARS OLD ARE PERMITTED TO GAMBLE. WINNERS KNOW WHEN TO STOP. SOUTH AFRICAN RESPONSIBLE GAMBLING FOUNDATION TOLL-FREE COUNSELLING LINE 0800 006 008 OR WHATSAPP HELP TO 076 675 0710.

Install the official Betway App and place your bets from anywhere, at any time as long as you have an internet connection.

The easy-to-navigate app makes finding the right game & placing your bets as simple & as fair as possible with immediate match resulting & competitive odds for the serious sports bettor.

BIG NEWS - We have been working on some amazing new offerings for the latest Betway release to offer a super sports betting experience!

ESPORTS
Don't just watch your favourite league battles, join Betway to bet on your favourite teams & players from League of Legends, Call of Duty, FIFA & many others!

LIVE GAMES
With cutting-edge technology allowing you to stream every flip of the card & every spin of the wheel, nothing comes close to the thrill of playing Live Games in real time.

In addition to our new offerings, you can continue to enjoy our classic sports betting experience:

PRE-MATCH & LIVE IN-PLAY BETTING
Whether you prefer to make sure your bets are placed in good time or to bet on all the adrenaline-filled action as it happens in real time, the Betway Sports Betting app has got you covered.

MORE CHOICE!
• Bet on Match Result (1X2), Double Chance, European Handicap, Both Teams to Score & various other betting markets.
• Bet on a wide range of sports – like soccer, basketball, tennis, rugby, baseball, golf, cricket & more.
• Bet on all the biggest soccer leagues from all over the world including the English Premier League (EPL), Premier Soccer League (PSL), Bundesliga, Ligue 1, La Liga, Serie A, FA Cup, UEFA Champions League & hundreds more.

MINIMUM BET
Extend your game-play & go into extra-time when you bet on your favourite sports such as soccer,
cricket, rugby, tennis from as little as R1!

EARLY CASH OUT
This feature allows you to take an early payout on your bets before they are settled, giving you more control over your bets and allowing you to manage your bets so much better than before.

BOOK-A-BET
Get your friends in on the action with Book-a-Bet, now you can share your betslips with whomever you want via WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, SMS or Email.

WIN BOOST
For each leg added to your Multi Bet betslip, we’ll boost your winnings by up to 150%. The more legs you add, the bigger your boost.

PROMOTIONS
Betway South Africa runs fantastic weekly & monthly promotions that offer new & existing customer’s rewards that can range from Free Bets, televisions & smartphones, to massive prizes like trips to the United Kingdom to watch Premier League football games.

BETGAMES
In addition to sports betting, the new lottery-style Betgames feature allows players to pick lucky numbers & participate in draws that happen all day, everyday!

LUCKY NUMBERS
Place bets on the outcomes of hundreds of international lottery draws.

24/7 DEDICATED CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We’re here to help you every step of the way! Contact us via Live Chat, WhatsApp, phone calls, email, Facebook & Twitter to handle all your account & betting queries.

BANKING
Choose from a range of safe & secure deposit options:
• 1voucher
• VISA (Debit/Credit Card)
• Instant EFT via I-PAY or SID
• EFT Bank Transfer (FNB, Standard Bank, Nedbank & ABSA)
• OTT Vouchers
• Kazang
• OZOW
• USSD

For more information on sports betting with Betway, visit our website at www.betway.co.za

The opening offer from Betway is not affiliated to Apple. Go to https://www.betway.co.za/terms-and-conditions for information regarding Betway’s Terms & Conditions.

We are a licensed sportsbook and offer a safe & secure online sports betting platform with the latest digital encryption technology.
Raging River Trading (Pty) Ltd (2011/134505/07) trading as Betway South Africa, is licensed and regulated by the Western Cape Gambling and Racing Board. Bookmaker License Number: 10181496-005.

No persons under the age of 18 years are permitted to gamble.

Winners know when to stop.

****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

Golf just got an upgrade. Welcome to GolfN — the only app that rewards you for playing golf. Whether you're grinding to lower your handicap or just out for a good time, GolfN tracks your game, helps you improve, and turns every round into real rewards.

Why thousands of golfers are leveling up with GolfN:

Play golf. Earn rewards.
Score points for every round you play and redeem them for premium gear, exclusive drops, and unforgettable golf experiences.

Tour-level GPS & stats.
Access "plays-like" distances, smart club suggestions, hazard previews, and full stat tracking across 40,000+ courses worldwide.

Play with friends.
Play with friends, follow rounds live, and climb the leaderboard. Earn bonus achievements and bragging rights.

Know your game.
Track detailed stats and sync with GHIN to watch your handicap update in real time.

Go beyond the course.
Earn rewards for checking in at tournaments, retailers, simulators, and events—your entire golf lifestyle counts.

Download GolfN today and get rewarded just for playing the game you love.

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Download the official SuperSportBet app. Place your sports bets or play casino games at any time. Get in the game with sports betting and live betting in the palm of your hands!
 
Make use of our exciting promotions to enhance your online betting experience! 
 
Get your 100% Deposit Match up to R5,000 on your first deposit, as well as 250 free spins. All general terms and conditions apply.  
 
Get better odds with your MyBoost promotion 
 
SuperSportBet offers you a MyBoost token once per day to boost your odds on one bet selection. To use your MyBoost token, add an eligible selection to your bet slip and click the ‘Boost >>>’ button.  
 
Have fun and get higher odds on a multiple bet by making use of our bet builder. 
 
With the SuperSportBet bet builder you can select a multiple bet on one event which allows you to place your bets on all possible markets within one game.  
 

Pre-match & Live Betting  
 
The SuperSportBet app offers a large selection of pre-match and live sports betting markets for many sports including soccer betting, cricket, rugby, golf, basketball, American football, baseball, darts, horse racing, MMA, motor sports & more! 

Soccer Betting On Leagues Around the World. 
 
We offer pre-match and live soccer betting on top soccer leagues around the world.  
 
Bet on the English Premier League, the DStv Premiership, LaLiga, UEFA Champions League, Bundesliga & more.    
 
Bet on the legends of the PSL like Kaizer Chiefs and Orlando Pirates.  
 
Bet on your favourite soccer teams & players 
 
Catch the best soccer betting odds in SA. Bet on Manchester United, Manchester City, Arsenal, Liverpool, Real Madrid, Barcelona, Kaizer Chiefs or Orlando Pirates & your top soccer superstars like Erling Haaland, Mo Salah, Harry Kane, Karim Benzema, Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi & more, using our world-class sports betting app.  
 
Rugby Betting 
 
We offer pre-match and live rugby betting with competitive rugby odds on exciting rugby leagues and tournaments like Super Rugby, the Rugby Championship, the United Rugby Championship, the Six Nations, the European Rugby Champions Cup and the Rugby World Cup. If you think Cheslin Kolbe will score a try or if you want to bet on points machine Handre Pollard, the choice is yours.  
 
Cricket Betting 
 
We offer smashing cricket betting with competitive cricket odds on top cricket leagues and tournaments like the Indian Premier League, the SA20, the Ashes and the ICC Cricket World Cup. Bet on world-class cricket players like David Miller, Babar Azam & more!  
 
Bet on Horse Racing 
 
Bet on exciting horse racing events like the Durban July, Greyville and more with SuperSportBet.  
 
Casino & Bet Games  
 
Whether you are looking for classic slots, modern live casino games, crash games like Aviator, table games, blackjack games, roulette, jackpot games, poker games, or bet games SuperSportBet offers a large selection of fun games to keep you entertained!  
 
Virtual sports betting and lotto games 
 
We offer thrilling virtual sports betting available all day with no pause 24/7, virtual soccer betting, virtual horse racing and international lotto games like UK49s and SA PowerBall.  
 
DEDICATED CUSTOMER SUPPORT 
 
We’re here to help you every step of the way! Contact us via our Live Chat, calling our customer care center, email or socials.
 
Contact number: 0861 996 704 
Email address: help@supersportbet.com 
 
Choose from a range of easy deposit methods including: Ozow, Instant EFT, Blu Voucher, 1Voucher, OTT Voucher, Kazaang Voucher, SnapScan, Zapper, Masterpass 

Download the SuperSportBet online betting app and bet with the best betting app in SA.   
 
SuperSportBet (PTY) Ltd, registration number 2021/962295/07, is licenced by the Western Cape Gambling and Racing Board. Bookmaker license: 10191097. No persons under the age of 18 are permitted to gamble. Winners know when to stop.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

Discover and Share Sports Moments

Use Buzzer's tools to create and share your own sports content. Whether it's a reaction to a big play, a highlight from your own game, or commentary on recent sports news, Buzzer makes it easy to share your perspective.

Connect with fellow sports lovers, discover new sports interests, and be part of a community that celebrates the spirit of competition and camaraderie.

Download Buzzer Today
Experience sports like never before. Join Buzzer and immerse yourself in a world where sports fans come together to share, connect, and celebrate.

Have feedback? Contact us at support@buzzer.com.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph

• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE

SwingU is the top-performing, free golf GPS rangefinder & scorecard app in the world, with more than 7 million users around the globe!

The SwingU app is FREE FOR LIFE and extremely accurate, reliable, and battery-efficient – rivaling any other golf GPS app or expensive golf GPS handheld or watch on the market!

WHAT YOU GET WHEN YOU DOWNLOAD
• GPS rangefinder that works on every course in the world with distances to greens and hazards
• Digital scorecard that easily tracks your score & putts and auto advances hole-to-hole
• Free handicap after posting scores from 3 rounds
• Track your shots and gain insights on how far you hit your clubs
• Tap the flag on any hole and get distances to 5+ tiers of the green
• Daily golf instruction tip from our team of top-100 instructors
• Apple Watch – get distances and keep score for you and your friends
• HealthKit features have been included when using the Watch on the course; e.g. track calories burned

WHY DO MILLIONS OF GOLFERS USE OUR APP?
• Reliable and easy to use – one tap and you’re playing
• Constantly improving with new functionality and new technology
• Commitment to user satisfaction with quick, reliable customer service
• The only golfer community-verified course database in the world

UPGRADE TO PLUS FOR A COMPLETE DIGITAL CADDIE EXPERIENCE

Upgrade to SwingU Plus, our AI-powered digital caddie platform with the following:

• “Plays like” yardages using live wind speed & elevation
• Club recommendations based on your club distances, shot tracking, wind speed & elevation
• Hole insights – your hole stats vs. all SwingU golfers, showing your tendencies for strategic decision making
• Hole notes – record notes / reminders per hole and reference those notes next time you play the course
• Enhanced scorecard & stats – record your score, putts, driver accuracy, bunker play, and penalty tracking and get detailed round summaries revealing strengths and weaknesses
• On-the-course games – handicap-adjusted scoring including Stroke Play, Skins, Stableford, Match Play, Nassau & Syndicates
• Green Maps for over 13,000 courses powered by StrackaLine

UPGRADE TO PRO FOR ELITE GOLFER PERFORMANCE & TRAINING

Upgrade to SwingU Pro to access our elite golfer game-improvement platform, including the following:

• SwingU Versus, the world’s easiest-to-use strokes gained statistics platform, used by more than 50 active tour players and 100+ active college golfers
• Stats & performance comparison vs. your target handicap (ranging from +6 to 30 handicaps)
• Relative handicap for every facet of the game: driving, approach, short game, bunker play & putting
• Post-round #1 game-improvement priority, revealing where you should focus your practice time
• Post-round personalized, prescriptive drill from a top-100 teacher to practice that week
• Video Drills on driving, ball-striking, short game, bunker play & putting
• All features of SwingU Plus

OTHER INFO

Monthly and yearly subscription upgrades are available. Payment for in-app subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by you, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

As a registered user, you'll be subscribed to the world’s top golf daily newsletter which includes promotions from our partners. You can 1-click unsubscribe at any time.

Despite years of optimizing the app, constant use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.
